title: How did greenhouse gas emissions from energy use in buildings change across the EU?
subtitle: Percentage change in emissions from fossil fuels used in buildings between 2005 and 2022. Total EU GHG emissions from buildings decreased by 31% over the period 2005-2022.
textNote: The EU decarbonisation strategy which is reflected in different legislations, promotes simultaneous end-user electrification in the residential sector, decarbonisation of the electricity and heating/cooling sectors, and improvements of energy efficiency in buildings.
